[[Budgeford]] | affiliation= | language= | birth={{SR|1304}} | birthlocation= | rule= | death={{SR|1404}} | deathlocation= | age=100 | notablefor= | family=[[Boffin Family|Boffin]] | parentage=[[Uffo Boffin]] and [[Sapphira Brockhouse]] | siblings=[[Gruffo Boffin|Gruffo]] | spouse=[[Adalbert Bolger]] | children=[[Filibert Bolger|Filibert]] | gender=Female | height= | hair= | eyes= | clothing= | weapons= | steed= }} '''Gerda Boffin''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]]. ==History== Gerda was the second child of [[Uffo Boffin]] and [[Sapphira Brockhouse]].{{App|Boffin}} She married [[Adalbert Bolger]] and had one son, [[Filibert Bolger|Filibert]].{{App|Bolger}} ==Etymology== Gerda is a name of the goddess [[Wikipedia:Gerðr|Gerðr]], an [[Old Norse]] name meaning "fenced-in".Orchard, Andy (1997).
